ref: 10438 yavāgūˊ f. ʻ rice -- gruel ʼ TS., yvāgū˘ -- BHS ii 449. 2. yvāgulī -- , ˚lyā -- f. ʻ sour scum of boiled rice ʼ lex. [Scarcely with J. Przyluski BSL xxxi 48 Pk. form of *yavaka -- ]
Pa. yāgu -- f. ʻ rice -- gruel ʼ;
B. jāu ʻ boiled crushed food ʼ;
Or. jāu ʻ overboiled rice, gruel of rice and other grains ʼ; O
Si. (Brāhmī) yāku ʻ rice -- gruel ʼ ( -- k -- = -- g -- or -- y -- ?).
